documents.document: But David the 🐺 found Madonna the 🐗, singing pop songs in a sweaty nightclub
🐺🛠🔛🐗 (or: 🐺 operated on 🐗) Then David the 🐺 performed surgery on Madonna the 🐗.
🐗😷🔜🙂🐺⛑ (or: 🐺 cured 🐗) After this, David the 🐺 cured Madonna the 🐗 of it ailments.
So in the end Madonna the 🐗 married David the 🐺 in Bay City and they honeymooned in Dumbarton
Thereafter Madonna the 🐗 and David the 🐺 were utterly inseparable; wherever David the 🐺 went Madonna the 🐗 was sure to follow. The End

What if a 🐗, who thought it was Madonna, fell in love with a 🐺 who thought it was David Byrne? #Madonna=#DavidByrne
David the 🐺 would often bump into Madonna the 🐗 at the water cooler. #Madonna=#DavidByrne
🐺💘😉👌🐗 (or: 🐺 flirted with 🐗) So at first, David the 🐺 invited Madonna the 🐗 for an intimate chat.
🐗🗓❤🐺 (or: 🐗 dated 🐺) So Madonna the 🐗 went on a date with David the 🐺.
🐗🙂🤔🆒🐺✨ (or: 🐗 was intrigued by 🐺) Then David the 🐺 was a source of constant fascination to Madonna the experimental 🐗.
After this, David the 🐺 inspired Madonna the 🐗 with his love of writing pop songs
🐺✨🐗😳✨ (or: 🐺 enchanted 🐗) Because David the 🐺 spun a web of charm around Madonna the 🐗.
So Madonna the 🐗 fell deeper in love with David the 🐺 than she ever had with Sean Penn
🐗👼🔚👉👌🐺 (or: 🐗 was deflowered by 🐺) Then David the 🐺 became Madonna the 🐗's very first lover.

A loathsome worm once embraced immorality. Along came a bold leopard who thought "A hero like me needs an enemy like this for my victories."
"For the best enemies are real villains," thought the bold leopard. So this hero decided to enjoy a victory over the loathsome worm.

A clever sheep once applied for a scholarship. A wise snake then thought "A poet like me needs a scholar like this for my legacies."
"For the best scholars are erudite scholars," thought the wise snake. So this poet decided to create a legacy for the clever sheep.

A stupid rabbit once lacked seriousness. Along came a monstrous lion who thought "A devil like me needs a dupe like this for my illusions."
"For the best dupes are unsympathetic fools," thought the monstrous lion. So this devil decided to perform an illusion on the stupid rabbit.

What if a 🐣, who was so dogmatic that it became a theocrat, ruled a 🐱 who was so moral that it became a believer? #Theocrat=#Believer
The 🐣 liked being the one with the big stick. 🐣📢🤐🐱 (or: 🐣 ruled 🐱) So at first, the moral 🐱 followed all of the dogmatic 🐣's rules.
🐱😠😒🐣 (or: 🐱 resented 🐣) But the 🐱 grew resentful about the 🐣.
🐱😐😤😐😤🖐🆓🐣 (or: 🐣 was resisted by 🐱) Then the 🐱 showed only defiance to the 🐣.
🐱😒👈😄🐣 (or: 🐣 mocked 🐱) But the 🐣 subjected the 🐱 to a barrage of sarcasm.
🐣😡🏴🔜🐱🏳 (or: 🐣 overthrew 🐱) So the 🐣 overthrew the 🐱 and stole its crown.
🐱😈💬🐣😇🔀😈🐣 (or: 🐣 was influenced by 🐱) But the 🐱 influenced the 🐣 in subtle but important ways.
🐱🖼🐣👀🤔💭✨🎨 (or: 🐣 was inspired by 🐱) Then the 🐱 became a source of inspiration for the 🐣.
🐣🎭🔁🐱 (or: 🐣 imitated 🐱) After this, the 🐣 imitated the 🐱's style and adopted it as its own.
🐣😥🐱 (or: 🐣 disappointed 🐱) "Could you be a bigger disappointment?" asked the moral 🐱 sarcastically.
Swords and knives scar you on the outside; insults can scar you on the inside. The End
